name: Esc-8-bit
detailed_description:
You have been captured by a rival alien clan! They plan on enslaving your mind and body for their diabolical schemes. But they'll never take you alive! You will escape!

Esc-8-bit is a challenging fast-paced runner designed in a similar fashion to the old NES era games. Playing as an escapee, you'll dodge enemies and obstacles aplenty! Jump and slide your way to freedom while taking out a few enemies in the process.

With your purchase, you'll receive the full game in all its raw challenging glory. No in-game purchases or pay-to-win items.

*Note: In order to hear all sound fx, please install openAL. See manual in external links.
